title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 382.4 - Continuation of a predetermination grant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 382.4 - Continuation of a predetermination grant

State Regulations
A predetermination grant shall be continued so long as
need exists and until a determination of eligibility for the categorical
eligibility is: (a) definitely
established; (b) not determinable
because public assistance is terminated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18

382.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
